paragraphs: I’m a passionate Software Engineering student specializing in Cloud Computing and Virtualization Technologies, currently pursuing my B.Tech at UPES, Dehradun. I enjoy turning complex technical challenges into intuitive, user-friendly digital solutions through thoughtful design and clean engineering.

I’ve contributed to a variety of impactful projects, including QuickRide, an on-demand vehicle rental platform where I designed and developed responsive web interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with a strong focus on UI/UX. Another project, Voice Agent, allows users to interact with digital platforms through voice-based commands, enhancing accessibility and engagement.

Currently, I’m working as a Frontend Intern at Sentienta Quality AI, where I contribute to the development of interactive and AI-driven web interfaces. In parallel, I’m also interning at IBM as a Software Development Engineer, where I’m expanding my backend and cloud infrastructure skills in a professional setting.

Beyond technical development, I’ve applied my creativity in roles like content and poster design at the ARJ Foundation, working on social awareness campaigns. I believe in blending innovation with empathy—creating solutions that are not only efficient and scalable but also visually engaging and human-centered.
